spell.name: Master Spark
entries: A brilliant, multicoloured beam 150ft long, 30ft wide extends from you in a direction you choose. All creatures in the spells area of effect must make a Dexterity or take {@damage 5d8 + 40} radiant damage, taking half as much on a successful save. The beam persists until the start of your next turn. Any creature who ends their turn inside the beam takes {@damage 5d8 + 40} radiant damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 8th level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 3d8} for each spell slot above 7th.
